name: Pidlwick II
languages: understands Common but doesn't speak and can't read or write

traits.name: Ambusher
entries: During the first round of combat, Pidlwick II has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't had a turn yet.

actions.name: Club
entries: Melee atk +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 2 (1d4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Dart
entries: Ranged atk +4 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 4 (1d4 + 2 damage) piercing damage.
